description: Can hold documents for a generic protocol.
title: Protocol

___description.description: A short description of the protocol or document
___description.title: Description

___url.description: An external resource with additional information about the protocol.
___url.title: External Link

___protocol_type.description: The category that best describes the protocol or document.
___protocol_type.title: Protocol Type

___title.description: A name for the protocol/authentication document
___title.title: Title

___protocol_classification.description: A classification for a protocol or document that is more specific than it's type.  For example, an Authentication document can be classified as a 'Cell Cycle Authentication' or a Biosample preparation protocol can be classified as 'Tissue Preparation Methods'
___protocol_classification.title: Document Classification
